healthy.description: Plant is healthy and shows no signs of disease.

leaf_blight.description: Leaf blight causes browning and spotting on leaves.
leaf_blight.remedy: Remove affected leaves, apply fungicide, ensure proper spacing and airflow.

leaf_yellowing.description: Yellowing of leaves due to nutrient deficiency or disease.
leaf_yellowing.remedy: Check soil nutrients, apply balanced fertilizer, ensure proper irrigation.

rust.description: Rust infection causes orange-brown pustules on leaves.
rust.impact: Weakens plant, reduces photosynthesis, can lead to leaf drop.
rust.remedy: Apply rust-specific fungicide, remove infected leaves, avoid overhead watering.

powdery_mildew.description: White powdery fungal growth on leaves and stems.
powdery_mildew.remedy: Use sulfur or potassium bicarbonate sprays, prune infected areas, improve airflow.
